## Magic Garbage Truck [MGT]
### Updated for 1.3.6* and Bridges DLC
This mod removes the need to place garbage handling buildings in your city.
---
### Option 1: Total Magic - Instantly removes all garbage as soon as it appears. - Just set it and forget it! (like traditional magic garbage) - Trucks and buildings are purely cosmetic.
---
### Option 2: Semi-Magic - "Magic Slider" to greatly increase garbage truck capacity (100-500%) - Over-powered super trucks reduce traffic and service strain. - Great for players who still want to see trucks driving around.
---
### Compatibility - This mod works with new and existing saves; safe to remove at any time. - Does not use Harmony or Reflection; lightweight, compatible, and less likely to break with game updates.
---
